data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, A. J. (2006): Periclimenaeus nielbrucei sp. nov. (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pontoniinae), a new sponge associate from the Capricorn Islands, Queensland, with notes on related Periclimenaeus species. Zootaxa 1224: 1-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172627
